name: Royal Garden Trouble
description:
The queen's birthday is soon and the royal garden is in no shape to celebrate. Can you find out the queens prefered design before it's too late?

Controls: mouse

This is a submission to MFG Winter 2023 https://itch.io/jam/my-first-game-jam-winter-2023

Art:

Plants and tiles from LPC on https://opengameart.org/; attribution is attached

Portraits: kiddolink

Sounds: Knock effect, cc0; dig sfx, cc0;
